ROW.Name_Event: Establishment of the Scuola di San Diego within the church
ROW.Synopsis: The Procuratia de Supra accepts the petition presented by the Secretary of the monastery on behalf of some devotees of San Diego who wanted to establish a Scuola (a secular confraternity) devoted to the saint. This was formerly located in the church of Poveglia.

Person.Role: Secretary of the monastery who reported the petition
Office in charge of the new scuola

Source.Event: Establishment of the Scuola di San Diego within the church
